cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 10th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 10th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Male Dorm
dorms.description: Male dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards. They offer male accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Well-appointed dorm room with bed linen and an individual locker is provided with every bed in our dorms.

We provide two fully equipped self-catering kitchens, a large laundry and lounge areas that provide space to spread out and socialise.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Our deluxe family room has one queen bed and two single beds, with it's own private bathroom and toiletries.

Room includes a lounge chair, desk, wardrobe, fridge, tea/coffee making facilities and a smart TV.  your lamps also double as wireless chargers

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior 2 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
This superior one bedroom apartment has a king bed with ensuite bathroom and toiletries.

Apartment includes a generous lounge area with dining table and chairs, sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, tea/coffee making facilities and a smart TV.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior 4 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Our two bedroom apartments have one queen bed and two single beds, with private bathroom and toiletries provided.

Each apartment has a lounge area with sofa bed, dining table and chairs, a fully equipped kitchen, iron/ironing board and a smart TV.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
